Installation¶

Python and Jupyter¶

Firstly, you need to install python and Jupyter. We support only Python 3. For quick start better to install Anaconda.

Retentioneering install¶

  • You can install our package using pip

    pip3 install retentioneering

  • Or directly from source

    git clone https://github.com/retentioneering/retentioneering-tools
cd retentioneering-tools
pip3 install .
